name: Liga
summary:
Liga is a German Indie football manager game first mentioned in the PC Spiele magazine of November 1995.

In this game you are the manager of a football club and start in the fourth league of the Bundesliga, with the goal of getting the title "Deutscher Meister". To do so you'll have to train your team and play the best players on the market, while you earn money with commerical deals and entry fees for your own football stadion.

This game later got something that could be seen as an sequel or enhanced version named LigaPro.
